scripts.start: REACT_APP_CURRENT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD) npm-run-all -p watch-css start-js
scripts.postbuild: echo 'pushstate: enabled' > build/Staticfile && echo $(git rev-parse HEAD) > build/static/commit
scripts.db: docker-compose -f ../backend/docker-compose.yml exec db psql -U postgres simple_report
scripts.e2e: cd e2e; docker-compose build; docker-compose run nightwatch ./nightwatch-entrypoint.bash; docker-compose down -v; cd ..
scripts.deploy-azure-dev: REACT_APP_OKTA_URL=https://dev.simplereport.gov REACT_APP_APPINSIGHTS_KEY=29a75c50-8485-4d80-8e1b-41b1a091abb6 REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL=https://dev.simplereport.gov/api REACT_APP_BASE_URL=https://dev.simplereport.gov REACT_APP_PATIENT_EXPERIENCE_ENABLED=true PUBLIC_URL=/app/ yarn build && az storage blob upload-batch -s build/ -d '$web' --account-name simplereportdevapp --destination-path '/app'
